name: integrative
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
combining two or more things in order to make them more effective: The new system will allow more efficient and integrative management of our data. Our patients might benefit if we took a more integrative approach to their care.
More examplesFewer examplesThey are developing an integrative approach that will allow the forest to be used for both commercial and recreational purposes.The book contains too much repetitive description and not enough integrative analysis.The group has an integrative strategy for linking biology with the social sciences.
